text: Todd J. Gilliland (born May 15, 2000) is an American race car driver. He is the son of former NASCAR Driver and Team Owner David Gilliland. In 2023, he is splitting time between the Nos. 38/36, and 15/51 for Front Row Motorsports and Rick Ware Racing. title: Todd Gilliland
